signals.name: IVI_PowerState
signals.description: Broadcasts the current power state of the IVI system.
signals.value_description: Enum: {OFF, STANDBY, ON, SHUTDOWN_IN_PROGRESS}

signals.name: IVI_ShutdownRequest
signals.description: Signal received by the IVI system to initiate a controlled shutdown.
signals.value_description: Value: 'SHUTDOWN'

signals.name: IVI_System_Status
signals.description: Transmits the general status of the IVI system.
signals.value_description: Object: {system_state: Enum {INITIALIZING, RUNNING, DEGRADED, ERROR}, error_code: Integer, app_status: Object {navigation: Enum {OFF, READY, ACTIVE}, media: Enum {OFF, READY, PLAYING, PAUSED}}}

signals.name: IVI_Heartbeat
signals.description: Heartbeat signal maintained by the IVI system.
signals.value_description: Integer counter (0-255) incrementing with each transmission, wrapping back to 0 after 255

signals.name: IVI_HMI_Status
signals.description: Indicates the operational status of the IVI HMI.
signals.value_description: Enum: {NORMAL, LIMITED, FAILURE}

signals.name: DOOR_Status
signals.description: Indicates the status of vehicle doors.
signals.value_description: Enum: {LOCKED, UNLOCKED, AJAR} for each door.

signals.name: HVAC_Status
signals.description: Provides the current status of the climate control system.
signals.value_description: Object: {mode: Enum {OFF, AUTO, HEAT, COOL, DEFROST}, temp_driver: Float (16.0-30.0°C), temp_passenger: Float (16.0-30.0°C), fan_speed: Integer (0-10), zone_states: Object {front: Boolean, rear: Boolean, floor: Boolean, defrost: Boolean}}

signals.name: BMS_ChargingStatus
signals.description: Provides the status of the EV battery charging process.
signals.value_description: Object: {state: Enum {NOT_CHARGING, CHARGING, COMPLETE, ERROR, SCHEDULED}, charge_percent: Integer (0-100), range_km: Integer (0-800), charging_rate_kW: Float (0.0-350.0), minutes_remaining: Integer (0-1440), error_code: Integer}

signals.name: CAMERA_Stream_Available
signals.description: Indicates if a camera stream (e.g., surround view) is ready.
signals.value_description: Value: 'READY' when stream available.

signals.name: SENSOR_Data
signals.description: General signal carrying data from various vehicle sensors.
signals.value_description: Array of Objects: [{sensor_id: String, sensor_type: Enum {TEMPERATURE, PRESSURE, PROXIMITY, ULTRASONIC, CAMERA}, value: Float, unit: String, status: Enum {NORMAL, WARNING, ERROR, UNAVAILABLE}}]

signals.name: PDC_Sensor_Data
signals.description: Provides distance information from Parking Distance Control sensors.
signals.value_description: Object: {front_left: Integer (0-250cm), front_center: Integer (0-250cm), front_right: Integer (0-250cm), rear_left: Integer (0-250cm), rear_center: Integer (0-250cm), rear_right: Integer (0-250cm), status: Enum {ACTIVE, DEACTIVATED, ERROR}}

signals.name: DRIVE_Mode_Status
signals.description: Indicates the currently selected vehicle drive mode.
signals.value_description: Enum: {ECO, COMFORT, SPORT, INDIVIDUAL}

signals.name: DOOR_Lock_Command
signals.description: Command sent by the IVI system to lock/unlock doors.
signals.value_description: Enum: {LOCK_ALL, UNLOCK_ALL, LOCK_DRIVER, UNLOCK_DRIVER, LOCK_PASSENGER, UNLOCK_PASSENGER}

signals.name: WINDOW_Position_Command
signals.description: Command sent by the IVI system to control window positions.
signals.value_description: Object: {window_id: Enum {DRIVER_FRONT, PASSENGER_FRONT, DRIVER_REAR, PASSENGER_REAR, SUNROOF}, target_position: Integer (0-100) where 0 is fully closed and 100 is fully open}

signals.name: BMS_EnergyConsumption
signals.description: Provides real-time energy consumption data.
signals.value_description: Float (0.0-100.0 kW) representing current energy consumption rate

signals.name: ChargingSchedule_Request
signals.description: Transmits charging schedule parameters set by the user via IVI.
signals.value_description: Parameters: {start_time, end_time, charge_limit, priority_mode}.

signals.name: NAV_ChargingPOI
signals.description: Signal indicating available DC fast charging Points of Interest.
signals.value_description: Array of Objects: [{poi_id: String, name: String, distance_km: Float, available_connectors: Integer, power_kW: Integer, price_per_kWh: Float, provider: String, amenities: Array of Strings}]

signals.name: BMS_RangeEstimate
signals.description: Provides the estimated remaining driving range.
signals.value_description: Object: {range_km: Integer (0-800), range_with_climate_km: Integer (0-700), range_ecological_km: Integer (0-850), range_sport_km: Integer (0-600), confidence_level: Integer (0-100)}

signals.name: HVAC_Request
signals.description: Command sent by the IVI system to control climate settings.
signals.value_description: Parameters: {mode, temperature, fan_speed, zone}. Requires validation and MAC (ID 0x218).

signals.name: SeatTemp_Command
signals.description: Command sent by the IVI system to control seat heating/ventilation.
signals.value_description: Parameters: {seat_id, heat_level, vent_level}.

signals.name: HVAC_PreCondStatus
signals.description: Indicates the status of cabin pre-conditioning.
signals.value_description: Enum: {OFF, SCHEDULED, ACTIVE, COMPLETE}

signals.name: WINDOW_Position_Status
signals.description: Indicates the current position of vehicle windows.
signals.value_description: Range: 0% (closed) to 100% (open)

signals.name: TRUNK_Command
signals.description: Command sent by the IVI system to open the trunk/liftgate.
signals.value_description: Value: 'OPEN'

signals.name: Maintenance_Status
signals.description: Provides vehicle maintenance notifications.
signals.value_description: Object: {service_due_km: Integer (0-50000), service_due_days: Integer (0-365), oil_life_percent: Integer (0-100), alerts: Array of Objects: [{component: String, severity: Enum {INFO, WARNING, CRITICAL}, message: String}]}

signals.name: SEAT_Position_Command
signals.description: Command sent by the IVI system to adjust seat positions.
signals.value_description: Parameters: {seat_id, direction, movement}

signals.name: LIGHT_Control_Request
signals.description: Command sent by the IVI system to control exterior lights.
signals.value_description: Parameters: {light_id, state}

signals.name: DRIVE_Mode_Request
signals.description: Command sent by the IVI system to change the vehicle drive mode.
signals.value_description: Selected mode value (e.g., ECO, SPORT).

signals.name: STEERING_Angle_Status
signals.description: Provides the current steering wheel angle.
signals.value_description: Float (-720.0 to 720.0 degrees) where negative values indicate left turn, positive values indicate right turn

signals.name: PDC_Guidance_Data
signals.description: Provides data for overlaying parking guidance lines.
signals.value_description: Object: {guidance_mode: Enum {PERPENDICULAR, PARALLEL, ANGLED}, trajectory_points: Array of Objects: [{x: Float, y: Float, direction: Float}], confidence_level: Integer (0-100), recommended_action: Enum {FORWARD, BACKWARD, STOP, TURN_LEFT, TURN_RIGHT}}

signals.name: PARK_Assist_Status
signals.description: Indicates the status of the automated parking system.
signals.value_description: Enum: {UNAVAILABLE, SEARCHING, SPOT_FOUND, ACTIVE, COMPLETE}

signals.name: PARK_Assist_Command
signals.description: Command sent by the IVI system to activate parking assistance.
signals.value_description: Value: 'ACTIVATE'

signals.name: MEDIA_Control_Command
signals.description: Command sent by the IVI system (often via voice) to control media playback.
signals.value_description: Enum: {PLAY, PAUSE, NEXT, PREVIOUS, VOLUME_UP, VOLUME_DOWN}

signals.name: NAV_Destination_Request
signals.description: Command sent by the IVI system (often via voice) to set a navigation destination.
signals.value_description: Object: {dest_type: Enum {ADDRESS, POI, FAVORITE, CONTACT}, dest_data: String, arrival_time: Timestamp, options: Object {avoid_tolls: Boolean, avoid_highways: Boolean, prefer_ev_routes: Boolean}}

signals.name: VOICE_Recognition_Status
signals.description: Indicates the current status of the voice recognition system.
signals.value_description: Enum: {IDLE, LISTENING, PROCESSING, EXECUTING}

signals.name: HMI_Touch_Status
signals.description: Indicates the status of touch input processing on the HMI.
signals.value_description: Enum: {DETECTED, PROCESSED, REJECTED}

signals.name: Telltale_Status
signals.description: Provides the status of vehicle tell-tale indicators.
signals.value_description: Object: {door_ajar: Boolean, seatbelt: Boolean, airbag: Boolean, abs: Boolean, engine_check: Boolean, oil_pressure: Boolean, battery: Boolean, brake_system: Boolean, high_beam: Boolean, low_tire: Boolean, electronic_stability: Boolean}

signals.name: ALERT_Message
signals.description: Carries vehicle alert messages to be displayed on the IVI.
signals.value_description: Parameters: {alert_id, priority, text}

signals.name: ALERT_Acknowledge
signals.description: Signal sent by the IVI system to acknowledge reception of critical alerts.
signals.value_description: Acknowledged alert_id.

signals.name: PROFILE_UI_Settings
signals.description: Stores user interface preferences.
signals.value_description: Parameters: {theme, layout, favorites}

signals.name: VEHICLE_Status_Summary
signals.description: Provides a summary of key vehicle statuses.
signals.source: Various ECUs (consolidated by IVI or BCM?)
signals.value_description: Parameters: {doors, windows, lights, charging}

signals.name: ADAS_Feature_Status
signals.description: Indicates the status and availability of ADAS features.
signals.value_description: Parameters: {feature_id, status, availability}

signals.name: DIAG_Session_Request
signals.description: Signal used to request diagnostic sessions with the IVI system.
signals.value_description: Object: {session_type: Enum {DEFAULT, PROGRAMMING, EXTENDED, SAFETY}, security_level: Integer (0-7), timeout_s: Integer}

signals.name: IVI_SelfTest_Result
signals.description: Reports the results of the IVI system's startup self-test.
signals.value_description: Object: {overall_result: Enum {PASS, FAIL, PARTIAL_PASS}, component_results: Array of Objects: [{component_id: String, test_result: Enum {PASS, FAIL, SKIPPED}, error_code: Integer}], timestamp: Timestamp}

signals.name: IVI_Temperature_Status
signals.description: Reports the internal temperature of the IVI system.
signals.value_description: Float (0.0-120.0°C) representing the internal system temperature

signals.name: IVI_Memory_Status
signals.description: Transmits the memory usage status of the IVI system.
signals.value_description: Parameters: {ram_usage, storage_usage, swap_usage}

signals.name: IVI_Performance_Metrics
signals.description: Transmits performance metrics of the IVI system.
signals.value_description: Parameters: {cpu_load, gpu_load, render_time}

signals.name: DIAG_Command
signals.description: Signal received by the IVI system containing diagnostic commands.
signals.value_description: Object: {service_id: Integer (0-255), sub_function: Integer (0-255), parameters: Array of Bytes}

signals.name: DIAG_Command_Response
signals.description: Signal transmitted by the IVI system in response to diagnostic commands.
signals.value_description: Object: {service_id: Integer (0-255), sub_function: Integer (0-255), response_code: Enum {POSITIVE, NEGATIVE}, negative_response_code: Integer (0-255), data: Array of Bytes}

signals.name: SECURITY_Event_Log
signals.description: Transmits security-relevant events logged by the IVI system.
signals.value_description: Object: {event_id: String, timestamp: ISO8601 String, severity: Enum {INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL}, category: Enum {ACCESS, AUTHENTICATION, AUTHORIZATION, NETWORK, SYSTEM}, description: String, source_ip: String, user_id: String}

signals.name: IVI_Network_Status
signals.description: Transmits the status of network connections managed by the IVI system.
signals.value_description: Parameters: {network_id, connection_status, error_count, last_error}
